name: Singular Dungeon Demo
description:
Singular Dungeon is a turn-based RPG that you only need one button for! Attack, defend, and do various other things (only in the full version, though!) with any button you want! In this demo, you get to fight the fiendish False Friend. Watch out for its grab!

This demo also "includes" a PS1-style demo menu. Guaranteed to make you nostalgic if you're me.
